sentences.sentence: He took these actions purely in (the) furtherance of his own career.
sentences.translation: 他采取这些行动纯粹是为了促进自己的事业发展。

sentences.sentence: The thing that matters is the furtherance of research in this country.
sentences.translation: 重要的是促进该国的研究。

sentences.sentence: Each role is recognized as being part of the greater whole and a furtherance of the common good.
sentences.translation: 每一个角色都是伟大整体的一部分，都是共同利益的一个促进因素。
